text: Meta Platforms, Inc., known before 2021 as Facebook, Inc., is an American multinational Internet corporation which owns Facebook. It was owned by Mark Zuckerberg, other founders and the shared ownership given to its employees but it went public on February 1, 2012, and was headquartered in Menlo Park, California. Meta, Inc. started to be publicly negotiated on May 18, 2012. It owns several social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Threads. It owns Reality Labs, a virtual reality company. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American software companies Category:2004 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Companies listed on NASDAQ Category:Menlo Park, California
title: Meta Platforms
